alert.note: Alert for Bronx; Kings (Brooklyn); New York (Manhattan); Northern Queens; Richmond (Staten Is.); Southeast Suffolk; Southern Nassau; Southern Queens; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:43AM EST until February 28 at 10:00AM EST by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow and sleet. Total storm snow/sleet accumulations of 1 to 4 inches. Highest amounts across Long Island and the Bronx. * WHERE...Portions of northeast New Jersey and southeast New York. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL INFORMATION...The wintry mix is expected to change over to rain by mid-morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Check local Department of Transportation information services for the latest road conditions.
